question: Given a year and a month, what would be the simplest way to get the number of days of that month, in SQL?
answers: With some date arithmetic. The function DAYS_IN_MONTH exists in some database engines. If not, it is possible to go one day backward from the first day of the next month.
options: With the ANSI SQL function DAYS_IN_MONTH, which exists in all the common database engines.
